channel.title: [Delta] Making a Item Go In it's correct place instead of weapon?
channel.description: Okay i have a Delta Base and when i try to make a cape item it goes into the weapon slot even though i added it into Item.java and compiled. I don't have a Item4.java in my server so any ideas how to fix Thanks! ;D

item.title: [Delta] Making a Item Go In it's correct place instead of weapon?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

uhm try item.java (not the item.cfg! THATS AN ITEM LIST THE OTHER ITEM MAKES IT HOW U WEAR STUFF) just look for public static int capes[] and add the cape id there

Read full topic
